block.p: AMERICAN INTERNATIONAL GROUP, New York, named Ian D. Cormack to the new post of chief executive at its European operations. He had led the global industries investment group of Citigroup.

GENERAL MOTORS CORP., Detroit, named Lawrence Dewey, director for marketing, sales and service at its Allison Transmission unit, to the post of president at Allison. He succeeds Daniel Hancock, who was named chief executive at the General Motors powertrain unit venture with Fiat S.p.A. of Italy.
AMERICAN INTERNATIONAL GROUP, New York, named Ian D. Cormack to the new post of chief executive at its European operations. He had led the global industries investment group of Citigroup.

GENERAL MOTORS CORP., Detroit, named Lawrence Dewey, director for marketing, sales and service at its Allison Transmission unit, to the post of president at Allison. He succeeds Daniel Hancock, who was named chief executive at the General Motors powertrain unit venture with Fiat S.p.A. of Italy.
GILLETTE CO., Boston, named Edward DeGraan, executive vice president for global business management, to the posts of president and chief operating officer.
